### Checklist

- [ ] Created folder `data/<SYMBOL>/`
- [ ] Added `data.json` with correct token information
- [ ] Added `logo.svg` or `logo.png` (256x256 recommended)
- [ ] Addresses are checksummed (EIP-55)
- [ ] Token is deployed on specified chain(s)
